p: Chemical composition. Furanoeremophilanes (e.g., cacalonol, cacalohatine, dehydrocacalohastine) ( Abdo et al., 1992; Okuyama et al., 1994); phenolic compounds (e.g., kaempferol and derivatives, quercetin and derivatives, caffeic acid) ( Dâ€™Agostino et al., 1995); terpenes and steroids (spatulenol, lupeol, damaradienone) ( Ramirez et al., 2020).
